name: TC-05 - Alert displays when login with invalid password

testSteps.description: Example #1: {invalidPass=phuongthanhgiang+test37@gmail.com, validEmail=1234567, alert=Email or password is invalid.}

children.description: When I login with invalid password is phuongthanhgiang+test37@gmail.com and valid email is 1234567
Then System displays the Email or password is invalid. message in the right top of page

userStory.storyName: This is test scenario of Login Page

featureTag.name: This is test scenario of Login Page

title: TC-05 - Alert displays when login with invalid password

tags.name: This is test scenario of Login Page

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I open Login page
When I login with invalid password is <invalidPass> and valid email is <validEmail>
Then System displays the <alert> message in the right top of page
